title: Future "Food Delivery" skins
body:
What's your ideas? Personally I'm stuck on one in particular.
BBQ Shack {{champion:14}}.
His Soul Furnance has heat lamps and Buffalo Wings in it.  His axe is a large sign saying "Sion's Meat Shack" with a cartoonish version of himself holding a spatula on top. He fits the current "Food Delivery" line motif of being GOTTAGOFAST characters with his ult.
Canonically, he'd remain {{champion:3}}'s arch-enemy, as is always between Fried and Grilled Chicken salesmen.

Who else? What the hell would {{champion:432}} peddle?

replies.body: Not sure if 1350, or legendary skin

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f6ZkxR8a,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-04-10T00:05:24.707+0000)
>
> {{champion:268}} 
> No Azir?  I thought everyone wanted Azir
> 
> "THE ORDER IS GIVEN!"

Pizza Delivery Malphite because the only one that can challenge Birdio is a behemoth himself

http://orig01.deviantart.net/e5bc/f/2015/252/9/7/patreon_reward_4___pizza_delivery_by_chazzpineda-d98y9cx.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f6ZkxR8a,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-04-10T00:05:24.707+0000)
>
> {{champion:268}} 
> No Azir?  I thought everyone wanted Azir
> 
> "THE ORDER IS GIVEN!"

LOOOOOOOOOOOOOL

All Bard skins must now rhyme.

Hard Bard coming 2019.

chinese food delivery amumu? maybe after a rework tho... he looks outdated.

when he uses his Q a long ass greasy spiced up noodle will get shot out or something XD
his ult entangling everybody with those noodles.

allot of champions can fit into theme's like this and pool party, i would like riot to come up with way more theme's like these so that champions who mostly only get traditional skins who only fit the theme of that champions lore only can also get skins like these (like wukong, and no his new skin does not fit him at all and looks kind of weird and animations are cheap looking definitly not worth 1350).
If sion doesn't turn into a cow for his ult i uninstall {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
I want someone made out of complete food, like Amumu wrapped in bacon and cries oil. Also, i would like to have Poppy hold a giant chicken leg and smash people with it.{{sticker:sg-poppy}}

Panth, leo, akali, and tahm were made as chefs. Now sivir and galio with their own establishment in the food industry although I think sivir's only an employee delivering, nothing more. 

In any case, I love the direction riot's taking this whole theme into. I hope there will be more of'em.
